name: Aussie Lander
description:
Running

Lander has been packaged standalone for macOS and Windows. To play it on Linux, first add the PPA or download the AppImage here: http://love2d.org/ and then simply run the .love file with the binary.

Thanks for playing!

Story

You've been contracted to work the lunar surface in the land down under! Put down your A-Frame Supply Ship on the far docking station to deliver the babies goods to the dingos dock workers. Due to budget cuts, your shuttle is made of very fragile material, so please fly and land very carefully! There are four stations to make deliveries to.

Sometimes the landing pads are a little finicky, you might need to bounce a bit to get it to light up.

Good luck, mate!

Controls
KeyboardGamepadShip Thrust
WATurn Right
AD-Pad RightTurn LeftDD-Pad LeftRestart Level
RStartCheat
